Package scriptella.execution

Facade classes for xml scripts execution.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JmxEtlManagerMBean JMX MBean interface for ETL task.
 

Class Summary
EtlContext Execution context for script.
EtlExecutor Executor for ETL files.
ExecutionStatistics Represents script execution statistics
ExecutionStatistics.ElementInfo  
ExecutionStatisticsBuilder A builder for execution statistics.
JmxEtlManager Implementation of JmxEtlManagerMBean.
SilentExecutionStatisticsBuilder A minimized version of ExecutionStatisticsBuilder optimized for performance.
 

Exception Summary
EtlExecutorException Thrown on script execution failure
 

Package scriptella.execution Description

Facade classes for xml scripts execution.
